images.description: Ryoka is running through the midwinter landscape near Riverfarm with Ivolethe flying next to her. This is a scene from the last chapter of Book 4, Winter Solstice. Ryoka has just left Riverfarm and is wearing the scarf that Yesel gave her.
images.altText: young woman of east asian appearance running through a winter landscape with a blue light floating next to her.
images.prompt: action-shot of a determined athletic young female asian-anglo long-distance runner running past the camera in medieval sport outfit with trousers and a knit scarf, a satchel strapped to her back and a pouch on her belt running through the wilderness in the mountains in winter. next to her floats a tiny fuzzy blue light --no thin slender model smile agriculture fields surprise --ar 4:3 --v 6.1 --stylize 500 --personalize ht7qdta

images.description: Portrait of Relc Grasstongue, Senior Guardsman of Liscor and friend (sometimes frenemy) of Erin Solstice with his favourite spear.
images.altText: drawing of a muscular lizard-man wearing light leather armour and holding a spear
images.prompt: full body portrait of a tall bulky and very muscular lizard-man with light green scales and huge strong arms wearing guard gear and holding a spear in his clawed paw --ar 3:4 --v 6.1 --stylize 900 --personalize ht7qdta
